answers.2B: The eight metals showing variable valency 1) Iron (Fe) : +2, +3 (2) Copper (Cu) : +1, +2 (3) Mercury (Hg) : +1, +2 (4) Tin (Sn) : +2, +4 (5) Lead (Pb) : +2, +4 (6) Gold (Au) : +1, +3 (7) Chromium (Cr) : +2, +3, +6 (8) Manganese (Mn) : +2, +3, +4, +6, +7
